key.description: Software hive key where the information is retrieved from.

last-write-time.description: Date and time when the key was last updated.

DLL-path.description: Path where the DLL file is stored.

DLL-last-write-time.description: Date and time when the DLL file was last updated.

description: Regripper Object template designed to gather information of the DLL files installed on the system.
name: regripper-software-hive-appInit-DLLS
